meaning list.meaning: Coneixements o mètodes especials utilitzats en un treball (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: He learned the tricks of the trade from his mentor.
meaning list.sentence translation: Va aprendre les complexitats de la professió del seu mentor.

meaning list.meaning: Mostrar el veritable caràcter o les intencions d'algú (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: She showed her true colours when she refused to help.
meaning list.sentence translation: Va mostrar els seus veritables colors quan es va negar a ajudar.

word: turn back the hands of time
phonetic american: tɜːrn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm
phonetic british: tɜːn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm

meaning list.meaning: Tornar al passat o tornar enrere el temps (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: If I could turn back the hands of time, I’d make a different decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: Si pogués tornar el temps enrere, hauria pres una decisió diferent.

meaning list.sentence: He never went to college but learned everything from the university of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: No va anar a la universitat, però ho va aprendre tot de la vida.

meaning list.sentence: You can wait until hell freezes over, but I won’t change my mind.
meaning list.sentence translation: Pots esperar per sempre, però no canviaré d'opinió.

meaning list.meaning: alguna cosa es malgasta o falla (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: All our hard work went up in smoke when the project was canceled.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tot el nostre esforç es va esgotar quan el projecte es va cancel·lar.

meaning list.sentence: She’s waiting in the wings for a chance to prove herself.
meaning list.sentence translation: Està esperant una oportunitat per demostrar-se.

meaning list.sentence: He walked out on his family when things got tough.
meaning list.sentence translation: Quan les coses es van posar difícils, va abandonar la seva família.

meaning list.sentence: We’re wasting time discussing irrelevant issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: Perdem el temps discutint temes irrellevants.

meaning list.meaning: Sistema o grup que funciona sense problemes (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: The team works like a well-oiled machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: L'equip funciona com un sistema que funciona sense problemes.

meaning list.sentence: We had a whale of a time at the amusement park.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ens ho vam passar molt bé al parc d'atraccions.

meaning list.meaning: Estar molt pàl·lid per por o malaltia (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: He turned white as a sheet when he heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: Es va posar pàl·lid quan va saber la notícia.

meaning list.meaning: treballador d'oficina, persona que fa un treball mental (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Els treballs de coll blanc són cada cop més habituals a les zones urbanes.

meaning list.meaning: Una cosa que costa massa però que és inútil (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: L'estadi va resultar ser una inversió cara però inútil per a la ciutat.

meaning list.meaning: Una mentida inofensiva o ben intencionada (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Va dir una petita mentida per no ferir els seus sentiments.

meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: L'empresa va intentar tapar l'escàndol.

meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: Quan fan una festa, surten amb decoracions i menjar.

meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Vindré a la teva festa amb molta il·lusió!

meaning list.meaning: Premi o títol atorgat a l'última persona (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Van rebre el premi de cullera de fusta per ser els últims de la lliga.

meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Aquest nou producte de neteja funciona perfectament.

meaning list.meaning: Mai faria ni estaria en una situació (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mai em posaria aquest vestit.

meaning list.meaning: Repetidament, any rere any, durant anys (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Cada any visiten la mateixa platja.

meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: És massa covard per enfrontar-se al seu cap.

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: És difícil canviar algú amb vells hàbits (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Es nega a aprendre a utilitzar un telèfon intel·ligent; És difícil canviar els vells hàbits.

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: Tampoc ho sé, les nostres dues suposicions poden ser igual de precises (modisme)
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Per què el tren va arribar tard? Jo tampoc ho sé.
